About Glamour School of Beauty

Established with a passion for beauty education, Glamour School of Beauty has been empowering students with professional skills since our founding. We are a Zero accredited school focused on personal, business, and skill development.

Our mission is to provide accessible, high-quality beauty education that prepares students for successful careers in the beauty industry. We offer hands-on training in small class sizes to ensure every student receives personalized attention.

With locations in both Seshego and Mokopane, we serve the greater Polokwane area with convenient access to professional beauty education.

Professional instructors with industry experience

Small class sizes for personalized attention

Hands-on practical training with real clients

Certification upon successful completion

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our courses, services, and policies.

Our courses vary in length depending on the program and level. Beginner courses typically run for 2-3 weeks, while advanced courses can be completed in 1 week. We also offer a special 1-month comprehensive program that includes a medium kit. Check our price list for specific course durations.

For most courses, you'll need to purchase a kit that contains all the necessary supplies. We offer different kit sizes (small, medium, and large) at various price points. Some courses, like Hairdressing and Microblading, include a free kit or hairpiece as part of the course fee. For Cake Baking, all materials are provided in class.

While we don't offer formal job placement, we do provide career guidance and support. Many local salons and beauty businesses look to our graduates when hiring. We also teach business skills to help students who wish to start their own businesses after graduation.

To register for a course, you'll need to pay the R300 registration fee (payable once per month) and purchase the required uniform (T-shirt R150 or Scrubs R250). You can register at either our Seshego or Mokopane location. We recommend contacting us via phone or WhatsApp to confirm availability before registration.

Yes, we understand that investing in education can be a financial commitment. We offer flexible payment plans for our courses. Please contact our administration office to discuss payment options that work for your budget and circumstances.
